name: Back To The Overworld
description:
After two thousand years of enslavement and persecution by mankind, it finally seems that the creatures have gotten the upper hand in this war.

Now it's the task of 4 brave monster heroes to find their missing fellows.

However, despite of the won war, their journey is dangerous. There are obstacles to overcome and ethical relevant decisions to make.

Where will this journey take them?

Features

  • Explore different areas via Point & Click
  • Make decisions that matter
  • Meet interesting Characters
  • See how the Castle Town grows

Special Thanks To..

  • Yurudora (©2014 CloverLab.,Inc.) for the Character Images
  • The RPG Biz Community
    • Carl Marajay and Janrae Mendoza for an in-depth support during the development phase
    • Jay Harrison for organizing the Heroic Monster Game Jam '18

Please check credits.rtf inside the Game Folder for a detailed list.
